parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. You can obtain the name of the project from the response of the [CreateProject](~~478153~~) operation.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task. You can obtain the ID of the task from the response of the CreateDecodeBlindWatermarkTask operation.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The type of the task.

*   Set the value to DecodeBlindWatermark.
